body.name: Fixwal 4-Tier Shoe Rack for Closet, Metal Shoe Shelf for 16-20 Pairs of Shoes with 2 Hooks, Shoe Organizer Storage for Closet, Entryway, Bedroom, Hallway（Black）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 13 mins
features: [Large-Capacity Shoe Rack] The shoe rack can place 16-20 pairs of shoes at the same time and make your living room more neat and orderly. The large capacity of the 4 tiers shoe rack can meet your various shoe storage needs. In addition, it can be used as a display shelf to showcase your collection or use it in your studio to store miscellaneous items.

[Discover More Space] The shoe rack has extra bottom space to save more space and works well to collect your shoes, boots, books or other accessories. The compact shoe rack is ideal for closets, entryways, etc. In addition, the shoe rack has two multifunctional hooks for hanging keys, umbrellas, bags, etc.

[Easy to Assemble] No tools required, you can easily assemble manually by the parts provide. The whole process only takes about 15-20 minutes and you can easily finish it without any professional tools. Tip: when you complete the assembly, please pat the ends tightly with your hands.

[High Quality] The closet shoe rack is made from washable waterproof non-woven fabric and sturdy metal pipes, which is moisture-proof, durable and easy to clean. The non-woven design keeps dust from falling on the shelves below, keeping each pair of shoes clean. Great for placing baby shoes and high heels.

[Product Specification] Dimensions of shoe storage: 34"L x 10.6"W x 27.2"H. Set includes: 1 X shoe rack, 1 X wooden hammer, 1 X gloves, 2 X hooks and 1 X installation manual. The whole shoe rack is composed by splicing, so you can choose to purchase 2 or more units for vertical storage to maximize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my son
reviews.reviewText: My son said he received the shoe rack and he loves it. It’s durable and it’s just perfect for his closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price - sturdy and neat looking... we bought 4 and like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy once put together, good shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: The instructions that come with this are a little unclear. There are three different connectors to connect the three different metal pipes, and the connectors that have more than two pipes to connect need to have the longer opening pointing downward to assemble properly. Also, it's hard to push the pipes in correctly if you start connecting them at the shelf ends. It felt like one of my connectors got bent a bit when I was assembling one of the shelves starting with the end. You should start in the middle and then connect either side, then the ends. Also, pay attention to where the shelf fabric is supposed to go in the end, so that the seams can be kept on the underside of the shelf.I like that they included the little gloves, as many items are starting to, as they help protect your hands as you push pipes in and also keep the furniture clean during assembly. There is also a small mallet to help get everything pushed in properly for a good fit. Once put together, the shelf looks good and is fairly sturdy. A very good value. The dimensions listed are accurate, as I was able to fit this exactly where I needed based on the measurements. I have a nice little display for my sneakers now, I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I mean, it works
reviews.reviewText: If your not someone who can manage to figure out the parts on your own, then skip on this. I was so frustrated with the instructions that my husband had to take over. THE PARTS ARENT LABELED RIGHT ON THE INSTRUCTIONS!! As for the effectiveness of the rack it self, it’s great. It fits all my shoes and fits great in the bottom of a closet.
